description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in press conference:
quote_txt: The racial and ethnic makeup of the Gwinnett County Sheriff’s Office mirrors the community it serves.

description_txt: stated on September 24, 2015 in a radio show.:
quote_txt: "Six of the 10 richest counties in the United States surround Washington, D.C."

description_txt: stated on September 22, 2015 in an email to voters:
quote_txt: "Twenty-six men named William have been elected to statewide office and only seven women have had the honor."

description_txt: stated on September 1, 2015 in a television interview:
quote_txt: Obamacare doesn’t require members of Congress "to abide by the same rules that all of the other Americans do."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in a tweet.:
quote_txt: On the main GOP presidential debate: "Not one candidate on the debate stage has military experience … "

description_txt: stated on September 17, 2015 in a news story:
quote_txt: No openly gay man has ever been elected to the Georgia Legislature.

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in an interview on ABC's "This Week":
quote_txt: "We've had examples like in Yuma County, where we've been able to stop 97 percent of the illegal (immigration) flow, and those programs, they abolish."

description_txt: stated on September 27, 2015 in an interview on "Fox News Sunday":
quote_txt: The tax policies of George W. Bush "created a dynamic effect of high growth."

description_txt: stated on September 22, 2015 in an interview with Fox's "The Kelly File":
quote_txt: There is not "one of the Muslim nations" that doesn't have "discrimination against women, discrimination against gays, subjugation of other religious beliefs."

description_txt: stated on August 21, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "#GradInsurance debacle is a DIRECT result of #ObamaCare. #MIZZOU has to break the law to do the right thing."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: A "voucher school that closed after 9 days this year collected $5.4 million in taxpayer subsidies since first opening."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2015 in an interview with Ted Cruz:
quote_txt: Says Ronald Reagan "reversed his world’s ‘largest tax cut’ and raised taxes when revenues did not match the expectations."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2015 in an interview with CBS' Stephen Colbert:
quote_txt: "When (Ronald) Reagan came in, from 1978 to 1982, economic growth averaged less than 1 percent a year. There’s only one other four-year period where that’s true. That’s true from 2008 to 2012."

description_txt: stated on September 1, 2015 in an Austin City Council meeting:
quote_txt: Salaries of Austin residents who don't work for city government "have not been going up 3 percent a year for the last several years."

description_txt: stated on September 13, 2015 in an opinion piece in the Saporta Report:
quote_txt: Tens of thousands of Atlanta households pay more than 30 percent of their income towards rent.

description_txt: stated on September 23, 2015 in an interview:
quote_txt: "The pope and Donald Trump and Tammy Baldwin all agree" on eliminating the "carried-interest" tax break.

description_txt: stated on August 12, 2015 in a post on Twitter:
quote_txt: Missouri is "#1 in the nation for holding down tuition increases at public universities."

description_txt: stated on September 21, 2015 in comments on Bloomberg TV:
quote_txt: "Daraprim is still underpriced, relative to its peers."

description_txt: stated on September 22, 2015 in a tweet:
quote_txt: "The birther movement was started by Hillary Clinton in 2008. She was all in!"

description_txt: stated on September 10, 2015 in interview with Democracy Now!:
quote_txt: Says "the cascading effects" of climate change contributed to the rise of ISIS.

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in the second GOP debate:
quote_txt: There are a "multitude" of vaccines that do not prevent deadly and crippling diseases.

description_txt: stated on September 20, 2015 in a panel discussion on ABC News' "This Week with George Stephanopoulos":
quote_txt: Says Pope Francis "took the name of a saint who basically reached out to Muslims."

description_txt: stated on September 19, 2015 in remarks at the 2015 New Hampshire Democratic Party State Convention:
quote_txt: "Under Republicans, recessions happen four times as frequently as under Democrats."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in a news conference.:
quote_txt: "Just about half of rural hospitals operate in the red in Virginia. They operate at a loss."

description_txt: stated on September 8, 2015 in press release:
quote_txt: "Eighty-three law enforcement officers have died in the line of duty this year. Twenty-four of them were shot and killed in cold blood."

description_txt: stated on September 8, 2015 in a shareable graphic on the Web:
quote_txt: Says Bernie Sanders opposes "requiring all children to have a K-12 education."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in the second GOP primary debate:
quote_txt: When Carly Fiorina says Hewlett-Packard "revenues went up, that's because she bought Compaq. It was a terrible deal."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in the CNN debate:
quote_txt: Says Donald Trump was "forced to file for bankruptcy not once, not twice, four times."

description_txt: stated on September 16, 2015 in a debate:
quote_txt: The Obama administration’s "own Environmental Protection Agency" has said its Clean Power Plan "will have a marginal impact on climate change."

description_txt: stated on September 14, 2015 in a speech.:
quote_txt: "The top 1/10th of 1 percent today in America owns almost as much wealth as the bottom 90 percent."
